name: Mobilized force - Tank 2
description:
This is the follow up on the first Mobilised Force that brought thousands of player from all over the world to play the game on devices and online.

Mobilised force Tank 2 got extended features and tons of awesome hours to play"

Protect your base and defeat the enemies.

Organise and plan the attacks by tanks and flight and defeat your enemies once and for all.
3 different game modes to play, earn money and status to unlock new features in the marketplace.

* Story mode
* Ground war
* AI vs AI
* Air battles

Tell your men to strike, mobilize and bring this mobile war to an end!
Take your tank gaming to the next level with Tank 2 - Mobilised force

NO ADS
NO IN APP PURCHASES, earn your coins by taking out the enemies and concur the battlefields and use in the shop to gain more power and features.

100% gaming with no disturbance
